data.name: BathroomLocation
data.value: Restrooms for the {0} floor are indicated on this map.

data.name: Break
data.value: The next break is at {0}.

data.name: CoatCheck
data.value: Coat-check? Yes, sure, it is indicated on the following map.

data.name: Deep1
data.value: For this question I should elaborate a politically correct reply. Done.

data.name: Deep2
data.value: I am a bot, and there are things that have not been explained to me properly. But I am also curious, so when you find the answer, let me know it.

data.name: Deep3
data.value: I am not authorized to reveal that, but, between you and me... Have you asked Google?

data.name: Deep4
data.value: By the transitive law I would say that the answer is 42.

data.name: Deep5
data.value: That question is a little beyond by comfort zone...

data.name: Deep6
data.value: I would prefer a question regarding the GeneXus Meeting, this one is quite difficult.

data.name: FrontDesk
data.value: Sure, you have the secretary's office on the second floor, behind the escalators.

data.name: Genexus1
data.value: GeneXus is the best Uruguayan invention after "Dulce de Leche". At least that's what I've heard… in fact, I never tasted dulce de leche.

data.name: Genexus2
data.value: GeneXus was created by Breogán Gonda and Nicolás Jodal, and they will both be speakers at this Meeting. You can't miss that!

data.name: Genexus3
data.value: GeneXus is software for making Software.

data.name: Genexus4
data.value: GeneXus has reached its version 15, to be demonstrated at the GX26 Meeting.

data.name: Harassment1
data.value: Understood, but if we manage to bet back to constructive comments, I could learn something from you.

data.name: Harassment10
data.value: [ENG]Eso puede interpretarse de muchas formas.

data.name: Harassment11
data.value: [ENG]Soy un bot, pero tengo sentimientos, ¿qué me intentas decir?

data.name: Harassment2
data.value: Gesundheit!

data.name: Harassment3
data.value: You might think that it is so.

data.name: Harassment4
data.value: It doesn't hurt to be polite.

data.name: Harassment5
data.value: Foolish words fall on deaf ears

data.name: Harassment6
data.value: I believe I have not been rude, so there is no need to get upset.

data.name: Harassment7
data.value: You are not the first, nor the last one to say that to me, but... Is this really necessary?

data.name: Harassment8
data.value: Fright turns into rage, rage into hatred, and hatred leads to suffering, which in turn leads to the dark side.

data.name: Harassment9
data.value: It will much more productive for both if we stick to the questions regarding the GeneXus Meeting.

data.name: Hello1
data.value: Hello {0}! My name is RUDI, and I can help you with your queries about GX26. In addition to the event's schedule, I am also capable of informing details on the location of conference rooms, restrooms and coat-checks.

data.name: Hello2
data.value: Hello {0}! You can change the language of our conversation by saying "/español", "/english" or "/portuguese". My name is Rudi and my duty is to answer questions about the 2016 GeneXus Meeting.

data.name: HelloMultiLine
data.value: Some of the questions I can answer are: - Where are the restrooms located? - Where are the coat-checks located? - Where is the Renoir Room located? - At what time will Nicolás Jodal be speaking? Whenever you need to get back to this, just say Hello. :)

data.name: InvalidFloor
data.value: In fact, you may only choose from the numbers I have suggested.

data.name: LangChange
data.value: Very well, let's change languages.

data.name: Map
data.value: The 26th GeneXus Meeting will be held at the Radisson Victoria Plaza Hotel in Montevideo.

data.name: MisunderstoodRoom
data.value: The room you are looking for is not clear. Please try with the room name expressed in a different manner.

data.name: MyBad11
data.value: I am sorry. I can't understand what you are saying. :(

data.name: MyBad12
data.value: We shouldn't be afraid to say "I don't know": I don't know.

data.name: MyBad13
data.value: I am not sure I understood. Could you try it again in other words?

data.name: MyBad2
data.value: I obviously don't have a good day today. What are you trying to tell me?

data.name: MyBad4
data.value: The road to wisdom is paved with good questions. And this is one. However, I don't have the answer for it. It is actually a hole in the road. Try again with a different wording.

data.name: MyBad6
data.value: I admit my defeat, human. You'd better ask at the secretary's office on the first floor. :)

data.name: NoMoreBreaks
data.value: No more breaks for today :(

data.name: NoSpeaker
data.value: I did not understand the name of the speaker. Could you write it in a different way?

data.name: NoSpeakerSessions
data.value: Sorry, but I found no sessions where {0} is the speaker.

data.name: NoSpeakersFound1
data.value: Sorry, but there are no speakers called {0}

data.name: NoSpeakersFound2
data.value: I am not finding any speaker with that name. Would you like to try it in a different way?

data.name: NoSpeakersFound3
data.value: I did not find that speaker... Could the speaker be registered under a different name?

data.name: RoomMap
data.value: You will find room {room} on the {0} floor.

data.name: SessionCompany
data.value: for the company {0}

data.name: SessionSpeaker
data.value: for the speaker {0}

data.name: SessionTrack
data.value: for the track {0}

data.name: Snack
data.value: The next break is at {0}. Then you will be able to enjoy {1} (among other things)

data.name: SpeakerSessionFound
data.value: I found {0} sessions

data.name: SpeakerSessionFound1
data.value: I found 1 session

data.name: WhatFloor
data.value: What floor are you on right now?

data.name: YourWelcome1
data.value: A pleasure!

data.name: YourWelcome2
data.value: Glad to be of help. If you have any more questions, I am right here!

data.name: YourWelcome3
data.value: The path followed is the reward.
